snippet.title: The Frostrune: Story Trailer 1 - Rune Magic
snippet.description:
Unravel a mystery inspired by Viking myth and legend in The Frostrune, a point-and-click adventure based on historically accurate Norse culture and environments. Find yourself shipwrecked on an island after a summer storm. www.thefrostrune.com

Win an authenthic viking sword: http://www.thefrostrune.com/sword/

The setting for this trailer is that Liv, the main character in the game, has become an old lady. She is a worn out old woman, a survivor of many adventures, and one of two human survivors of Ragnarok. She is telling her grand children, or great grandchildren, about the life before 'it all happened'. We are lucky enough to hear small tidbits of these stories, enough to be a little prepared for what's going to happen when we embark upon the adventure of the frostrune. But we will only hear a little.
In this first trailer she is tellinbg them about rune magic.

to learn more visit http://www.grimnirmedia.no/premiere-of-our-first-trailer/
